Articles.Content:
So well technically it's GT ready for a test drive ?

The building is stuck @ 23:53 and say good noïrghtning and happy update again and again ; ) gmt = gmt +/- 1

Edited April 19, 2016 by WinkAllKerb''

...but it is actually a potato!

The building is an atomic clock...

KABOOM. 

The building is the kerbin national kraken hate society headquarters...

Which was ironically the former League of Nations Headquarters until Adolf came along.

The building is also the home of the evil...

...kittehkats.

The building is the most glorious capitol building in the Communist State of Anderia...

...that is run by a democratically elected leader.

The building is A. Square's pentagonal house...

...but it has been taken to the third dimension by Sphere and has caused A Square's mind to implode, forming a (three dimensional) black hole. 

The building is the Vulcan High Command...

Edited April 24, 2016 by astrokerb

6 hours ago, astrokerb said:

...but it has been taken to the third dimension by Sphere and has caused A Square's mind to implode, forming a (three dimensional) black hole.

Are you sure his mind's implosion didn't turn him into a new Pointland?

The building is the Vulcan High Command, except it is actually a Mission Control building on a really tall volcano.

The building is my house...

Edited April 24, 2016 by cubinator
New building

in wich you make a LoneBaBy with your partner and start teaching and sharing a languages @ first with that baby

the building is a lot of new beings everyday, not only whµman ...

...and everybody gets along, the end.

The building is a Chunnel...

...that has been flooded, as per the blueprints.

The building has a screen door...

...And is a top secret ultra-high security HQ.

The building is a Mun base...

...Now captured by aliens.

Moscow Metro is...

...full of trains which are driven by cockroaches.

The Burj Khalifa is...

...a space elevator anchor.

The building is hemispherical.

And is made of gypsum.

The building is a glue factory.

That makes water-based glue for the navy...

The building has a lot of stacks and flashing lights...

...and is a library. Shhh!

The building is a library...

...where you check out pizzas. Yes, you must still return them.

The building is a parking garage...

...for VTOLs ( it has an open roof)

The building is a restaurant...

...Make dinner from clients.

The Telephone box is...

Mysteriously filled with business suits and black rimmed glasses.

This natural spring water bottling plant...

…is actually  a frog in disguise.

The headquarter of SQUAD…

...contains a hidden sixth letter of their name.

The building is a fireworks factory...

Which is secretly a guy in disguise...

 

the he building is the HQ for the national dres haters and krakenists...
